amendment.description: To provide a 1-year prohibition against lobbying for senior career staff of executive branch agencies.

action.text: Amendment SA 2936 ruled out of order by the chair.

Amendment SA 2936 proposed by Senator Lott for Senator Inhofe. (consideration: CR S2491-2493, S2499; text: CR S2492-2493) To provide a 1-year prohibition against lobbying for senior career staff of executive branch agencies.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2936 proposed by Senator Lott for Senator Inhofe.
